prompt: Write a ~50-60 word story about something crazy that happened at lunch today. Use Gen-Alpha slang and emojis to make it funny and engaging. Make sure the story is clear and makes sense to the teenage reader.
response: At lunch today, the cafeteria dude dropped a whole tray of spaghetti and it went *full send* across the floor like a noodle tsunami 🍝💥. Everyone screamed “AYO?!” and my friend tried to skateboard on it—mega L—then wiped out in front of our crush 😭. The principal slid in too. Absolute chaos, 10/10 content. 😎📱
